casebody.data:
UNITED BONDING INS. CO., Plaintiff-Appellant, v. Herschel A. GENTRY, Trustee in Bankruptcy for E. O. Cooley Constr. Co., et al., Defendants-Appellees. No. 29728

Summary Calendar.*

United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. July 26, 1971. Harvey C. Koch, Beard, Blue, Schmitt & Treen, New Orleans, La., for appellant, United Bonding Ins. Co. Frank M. Coates, Jr., Taylor, Porter, Brooks & Phillips, Baton Rouge, La., for defendant-appellees, Herschel A. Gentry, E. O. Cooley Const. Co. and others.

Before THORNBERRY, MORGAN and CLARK, Circuit Judges.

Rule 18, 5th Cir.; see Isbell Enterprises, Inc. v. Citizens Casualty Co. of New York et al., 5th Cir. 1970, 431 F.2d 409, Part I.

 PER CURIAM:

Affirmed. See Local Rule 21.1

. See NLRB v. Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America, 5th Cir. 1970, 430 F.2d 966.
